text: The 2011 Badminton Asia Championships was the 31st tournament of the Badminton Asia Championships. It was held in Chengdu, China from April 19 to April 24, 2011. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Men's singles |rowspan=2| Lin Dan |rowspan=2| Bao Chunlai | Du Pengyu |- | Chen Long |- |rowspan=2|Women's singles |rowspan=2| Wang Yihan |rowspan=2| Lu Lan | Cheng Shao-chieh |- | Jiang Yanjiao |- |rowspan=2|Men's doubles |rowspan=2| Cai Yun Fu Haifeng |rowspan=2| Hirokatsu Hashimoto Noriyasu Hirata | Chai Biao Guo Zhendong |- | Xu Chen Zhang Nan |- |rowspan=2|Women's doubles |rowspan=2| Wang Xiaoli Yu Yang |rowspan=2| Tian Qing Zhao Yunlei | Ha Jung-eun Kim Min-jung |- | Bao Yixin Zhong Qianxin |- |rowspan=2|Mixed doubles |rowspan=2| Zhang Nan Zhao Yunlei |rowspan=2| Xu Chen Ma Jin | Sudket Prapakamol Saralee Thungthongkam |- | Hong Wei Pan Pan |} ==Medal table== ==External links== *Badminton Asia Championships 2011 at tournamentsoftware.com Category:Badminton Asia Championships Asian Badminton Championships 2011 Asia Championships Badminton Asia Championships
title: 2011 Badminton Asia Championships
